summary: Implements metrics that assess whether an autonomous agent successfully fulfills its intended goal, handling both single‑turn and multi‑turn conversations. Two variants are provided: one that compares the agent’s response to a known reference answer, and another that evaluates goal achievement without any reference.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quantitatively evaluate and benchmark the effectiveness of AI agents in achieving their objectives, facilitating model improvement, quality assurance, and product reliability.
